Header: Gotabhaya meets Ranil at Temple Trees
Content: Former Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa visited Temple Trees yesterday to personally look into the security of former Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. It is reported that Gotabhya Rajapaksa visited Temple Trees yesterday and had discussions with Ranil Wickremasinghe. Following the defeat of Mahinda Rajapaksa at the Presidential elections held on January 08 th 2015, the then Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe took action to arrange him to leave Temple Trees securely. In a similar manner it is reported that former Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa who went to Temple Trees yesterday drew his attention to the security of the former Prime Minister. Discussions had also centred on the initiatives that should be taken to the measures that should be in place on the security of the former Prime Minister in the future. Former Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa had taken steps to apprise President Maithripala Sirisena and Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa as well as the security sector to take necessary action on the security of the former Prime Minister. They also discussed to prevent any hindrance being caused to the former Prime Minister, Ministers of the previous Government or any United National Party supporter as a result of this political change.
